# isFindInteractionEnabled

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that enables a text view’s built-in find interaction.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var isFindInteractionEnabled: Bool { get set }
```

## Supporting Find and Replace

- **findInteraction**: The text view’s built-in find interaction.
